name: lga_vic_crime_stats_2008_2017
title: LGA Number of Offences in Victoria by Offence Type 2008 - 2017
abstract:
The Crime Statistics Agency (CSA) presents statistics about the characteristics of crime recorded on the Victoria Police Law Enforcement Assistance Program (LEAP). Recorded offences include any criminal act or omission by a person or organisation for which a penalty could be imposed by the Victorian legal system. This dataset covers crime sub-categories from 2008 to 2017
For the purposes of CSA statistics, an offence is counted and included in the data where it was reported to, or detected by, Victoria Police and, was first recorded in LEAP within the reference period. Recorded offence data are compiled on the basis of the date that the offence was created on the LEAP database, rather than the date the offence was detected by, or reported to police. The create date may not be the date when the offence occurred, or the date when the offence came to the attention of police.
The crime statistics are aggregated to Australian Standard Geographical Classification (ASGC) Local Government Area (LGA) 2011 boundaries (1259.0.30.001).
Please note, in order to maintain confidentiality, sensitive offence counts for subdivisions Homicide and related offences and Sexual offences with a value of 3 or less are given a value of 2 to calculate totals. For more information visit Victorian Crime Statistics Agency.

selectedAttributes.name: a70_stalking_harassment__and__threatening_behaviour
selectedAttributes.title: A70 Stalking, harassment and threatening behaviour
selectedAttributes.description: A70 Stalking, harassment and threatening behaviour offence count. Acts intended to cause physical or mental harm, or arouse apprehension or fear through a repeated course of unreasonable conduct. This includes actions that are intended to harass, threaten or invade the privacy of an individual. Includes: stalking, harassment and private nuisance, and threatening behaviour.

selectedAttributes.name: lga_erp
selectedAttributes.title: LGA Estimated Residential Population
selectedAttributes.description: Local Government Area (LGA) Estimated Resident Population (ABS). Estimated resident population, for years preceding the current year, are taken from the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS), Regional Population Growth, Australia (cat. no. 3218.0) - as at 30 June.
